website_summaries.verdict: An easy to clean 2-in-1 design with a classic wooden construction.
pros: The look of a traditional wooden knife block with gentle interior flex rods that can be put in the dishwasher
Fits any knives up to 8" in length
Getting knives in and out of the block is smooth and easy
cons: A little smaller than the other options on our list

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: We had two sets of knives, and one was just in a plastic store thing. I'm not comfortable just leaving knives in drawers. We were able to perfectly marry the sets with this! I was concerned about the size when I opened it, but it's obviously perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alex L

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok after I repaired it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice until you stab your knifes into it. The plastic reeds bend and make it impossible to push your knife back in fully. I had to cut all of the bent and damaged peices and then it made room for my knifes. The mfg needs to remember the word displacement. If the reeds are packed in so tightly how do you expect to there to be room for my blades. Great idea but poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: courtney cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Neat concept, but not perfect in implementation.
customer_reviews.text: Its a neat idea in concept, but I found that some of the plastic "strands" that make up the block had gotten bent over while inserting the knives into the block. This makes them get caught up when re-inserting. Not a major issue, but not something I'd have expected to happen. Also feel like the density of the strands could have been less; it is easy for the block to feel overloaded with knives as they start getting pretty tight.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this block!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for years a block that came with a knife set I own. But over the years, that collection has changed quite a bit with the new knives not having a home. I love that I can now just choose my favorites to have nearby. I keep a few large knives up top and the smaller pairing knives down below. It's about the same size and look as my old one and I live just reaching over and dropping the knives in. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Your Knives Will Be In Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most brilliant invention for knife lovers and chefs to come along in ages. Every other knife block is now irrelevant! I'll bet that after you gift yourself with this beautiful addition to your counter, you will think of buying one for everyone you know with a knife collection. This is just so cool, I promise that you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Tallahassee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: World’s best knife block. I could not believe it. I took all my knives that were crammed into a similar non-tiered block- with blades half out because it was full - and fit them all in this knife block seated to the hilt and had room to spare. I have ordered 3 more for different locations. This would make a fabulous holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hal B.

customer_reviews.title: Not functional for sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: I also had issues with the plastic reeds breaking. It appears that they get cut by the knives and requires constant grooming of the broken peaces or the knives will stop fitting. Would not recommend to anyone who has sharp knives.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn’t fit any knives after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item. Looks great and worked decently in the beginning. But after awhile and after you continuously put your knives in and take them out, the little bamboo sticks start to break off and they get stuck at the bottom. So then it’s impossible to get your knife to fit into the holder. At this point, I can only fit about 1-2 knives all the way in. Which is ridiculous. Don’t recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DANY BENJAMIN

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have a matching knife set you need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: We have been building pur knife collection of the years so we don't have a matching set- this did the trick to hold them all! When I first opened it I was afraid it wouldnt hold everything without them all touching but it has a surprisingly large capacity. Looks great on the countertop and easy to wipe down. I do have to tilt it down to get the bigger knives from the top but thats not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Odd angle
customer_reviews.text: This stand is well made, but the angle is awkward. It sits on my counter in such a way, that it’s impossible to draw out a longer knife. I included the picture of my old block for comparison. It will work for you if you don’t have cabinets though.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Stops holding knives after a while
customer_reviews.text: This started off well. It looks nice and held a variety of knives and scissors. Over time, the plastic rods started breaking and bunching together preventing knives from going all the way in. This is especially an issue with larger knives like a chef or cleaver. The small knives haven't caused as much of a problem. Despite liking how it looks and how it initially performed we're now replacing it with something else.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berthiaume

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wanted a knife block like this for a long time. We finally talked about it and got this one a few months ago. I am so glad we did! Before getting the universal block we had large knives sitting on the counter and now they are all nicely put away in the block. It’s fantastic and seems fairly easy to clean, if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dallan & Kimberly Grange

customer_reviews.title: Where as this knife block been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this knife block. Its sturdy, but doesn't take up too much counter space, and its great quality. I LOVE that you can just stick the knives in where ever. Its so functional! I have a large bread knife, a large chefs knife, a large santoku, a small santoku, and a paring knife, as well as kitchen shears and it fits all of these perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get my knives out of the kitchen drawer. I thought it would hold more of my knives than a regular slotted block. It doesn't. In fact, it seemed to hold less knives than the other kind of block. I returned it. At a loss... I didn't notice when I bought it that it wasn't free returns... :(
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great clean, flexible way to hold your knives!
customer_reviews.text: I love the universal knife block! It looks great and can hold any size knife! Seems to be more sanitary than the traditional pre-slotted blocks too since small bugs/roaches often made nests in those and it was super hard to clean/clear them out. Highly recommended, ***** stars
customer_reviews.author: Potteringpuck

customer_reviews.title: Universal knife holder!
customer_reviews.text: We have a variety of different knives (bread knife, chef's knife, cleaver) from different manufacturers that we used to store on a knife strip. This block allows us to store all of them safely without trying to maneuver into a special slot. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Wen

customer_reviews.title: short life, not for serrated knives
customer_reviews.text: I have four knives and scissors. I wanted something versatile for my eclectic set. It was great at first, but it does seem to dull knife edges. It also doesn't work well with serrated knives. Eventually my bread knife destroyed it. It lasted eight months. I went with a wall mounted magnetic knife strip and have been happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Organize your knives!
customer_reviews.text: My knives were in my silverware drawer. There were too many to keep in there and they would often stick which kept the drawer from opening. My son bought this to organize them for me. I love it! All of the various sized knives fit well and it looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pins get bent, then unable to use
customer_reviews.text: After sparingly using for the past 3 months, it has become almost unusable due to the pins getting bent and tangled in the bottom. Going back and reading through some of the reviews, seems like this is a common problem. I use sparingly, as I'm the type to use usually one knife and keep it in the drying rack, so really only put a knife back into this block maybe once a week, means I might've put a knife back into this block like a dozen times and it's already all bent and tangled to the point I try and put a knife in and it'll only go down maybe 4 inches with the rest sticking out.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Y

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those various knives
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of these for the first time when I was visiting my brother overseas. Overall it is the same as his but with less of the filling which is why I marked it down to a 4. The top reason I love this product is that I can put all my knives that are not the same brand in it and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: M&R's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice universal knife holder. Very upright angle doesn't work under cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: I like this style of knife block much better than the traditional slotted style. My only complaint about this one is that the overall angle is more upright than the slotted one it is replacing. This means that I can't place it under the same kitchen cabinet as the older one which "leaned forward" more. Fortunately, I found a different spot with more vertical clearance and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: ecmck

customer_reviews.title: this is a great knife block
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a bit of knifes in all shapes and sizes, this is wonderful. I had to have my knives in a box next to my stove because half of them didn't fit in a regular block. Now I have them on this and my kitchen looks so much better with that box gone.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel H.

customer_reviews.title: Still new
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to this knife block. So far seems good and holds all the knives I wanted it too. The unit itself feels light which gives me some concerns for long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Spolarich

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Product - Well Made
customer_reviews.text: We had a similar product but the wood split when we inserted the many knives we have. This one is much better because the bristles are looser and inserting many knives does not press outwards on the wood. Having the small/steak knife section is also good because we use that for paring knives and everything looks neat and well organized.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a varied collection
customer_reviews.text: For people who end up with a mixed collection of knives, this is really great. You can adjust the space between knives depending on how many you're trying to pack in. I also love how classy it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Fits all types of knives
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife block. I'd been needing to replace our former one as we had accumulated more knives than could fit in it. This block is a bit smaller than I had anticipated, but it fits all the sizes of the knives we have. I may end up purchasing another at a later date so we have even more space (we do a lot of cooking), but for now it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: The two tier design
customer_reviews.text: The block fit in the space we had the old one.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Hydrick

customer_reviews.title: Really cool concept, but it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: We had ours for about a year until it was unusable anymore. The black rods just break and get bundled up over time. It made the kitchen look cool and provided good storage for the time we had it, so no big complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GratefulSK

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of ceramic knives that didn’t come with a knife block so I bought this. I’m really happy with this item. It holds the knives well and it’s heavy so it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for a while, it has been a let down. First it should be noted this will only hold Chefs knives of a certain size. My biggest issue is the sticks that make up the interior manage to both dull knives and get cut and warped super easily. Food gets stuck down there and it just becomes a nightmare. All the knives I use regularly have moved back into their covers and the drawer from which they came, pretty useless product if you actually use your knives
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good storage & keeps knives further away from toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I don't have to worry about having 10 slots and 12 knives. Keeps the knives on the back part of my counter and out of a knife drawer that a toddler could easily reach into. Attractive bamboo fits in with many decors. Versatile for many types of knives.
customer_reviews.author: BB's

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it's actually look good but cheap. You can buy such kind of knife block of better quality even for the same price. Anyway you can put 4-5 big knives in the top and about 6 small knives in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Z

customer_reviews.title: Organize your knives the way you want!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife holder! You get to organize it the way you want various the way they want you to store your knives! I'd clearly buy this again if I ever needed another one!
customer_reviews.author: D. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps all knives in one place
customer_reviews.text: Love that it doesn't have set knife slots I can keep all my knives in one place I no longer have to worry about my knives being banged up in the drawer anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheaply made. Suggestion is that you go to a store to look. When you find one you like, order it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cynwit

customer_reviews.title: Great for combining two sets of knives
customer_reviews.text: This is great! all of our knives fit in here and it works very smoothly. It is very heavy and seem to be of a high quality.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and Disappointing Product
customer_reviews.text: We switched from a standard wood block knife holder to this bristle model to keep sharper blades. At first it was great but over time and much use the knives were unable to nestle in as before. Today, our knives can only go in 1/2". Not worth the money and will go back to the tried and true -- wood block. I'm so sorry it's past it's return date.
customer_reviews.author: Rusters

customer_reviews.title: So versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have many different knives I’ve bought over the years and this is perfect for those! I didn’t have to buy a new knife set just to get a block to hold them!
customer_reviews.author: Aliesha

customer_reviews.title: i should have found out about this product  earlier!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great idea, i was always worried about the wooden knife slots being mouldy and mildewed so this is a really great idea. I washed the rods before using it, the rods are very very tightly packed so they did take some time to dry. My suggestion to the manufacturer is to divide the rods into 4 sections so that they can be washed and dry easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage, protects knives
customer_reviews.text: I buy knives individually, so they don't have convenient storage. This solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this block for a few months. After 2 months the knife block is not usable. As others have stated, the plastic reeds will bend and break. Don't be fooled by the overall rating.
customer_reviews.author: EMAW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Enough
customer_reviews.text: I really like that you can place a knife anywhere, very well made but doesn't hold but a few. I gave mine away.
customer_reviews.author: Dan4th1

customer_reviews.title: Loose filling
customer_reviews.text: The lower tier, even with 6 knives, is still pretty loose. I have another block with only a single section. That filler is quite dense. Wish this one was as well. I do like the double tier, since I have quite a few knives and am expecting 2 more soon, so the organization is nice. The unit could be taller,as well. I hang a sharpening steel off the back and this one isn't tall enough to do so,
customer_reviews.author: scotchtradr

customer_reviews.title: Every thing fits!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea just how versatile this butcher block knife storage unit would be. I was able to get all my knives and other accessories including the scissors in it. And it’s beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Fifield

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks very nice in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks very nice in our kitchen, and I really like the ability to take out the inserts and clean it in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Todd B Kersh

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for getting my knives out of the drawer. Works great and great value. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact space saver
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Takes up way less counter space yet holds the knives I use daily. Love it has space too for steak knives. Am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for under the counter and fits a much better number of knifes than our block.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as i thought.
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are given but i thought it would be bigger than that. You cannot put a lot of knives in there. I will have to update my review when i fill the knife holder.
customer_reviews.author: Berangere L.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered a set of knives, but they did not come with a holder. I decided to give this style a try, and it is great! No pre-cut slots and we can place the knives in as we wish. Can hold 10-12 knives, no problem! Also looks more sleek and modern than the traditional style knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine O.

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but then becomes dangerous
customer_reviews.text: At first works great but after a few months the insets break apart and the knives no longer fit and cause a dangerous situation exposing the blades.
customer_reviews.author: RPB

customer_reviews.title: Nifty!
customer_reviews.text: Never had seen or used a knife block that did not have individual slots. The knives sit well and do not move into one another. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Best knife block I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to like this knife block as much as I do, but it is fantastic! I absolutely love being able to place a knife wherever I want, rearrange knives when I get a new one, and that I can clean it! I take this out to clean once every month or two. Super convenient to have the separate row for steak knives. all around, the block looks nice, functionality is fantastic, the only way I could be happier with my purchase was if it was a nicer wood, but that would easily make it cost twice as much. Absolutely perfect for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: flexibility at my fingertips
customer_reviews.text: I like that there isn't a specific place for storage. I'm able to keep my most-used utensils close at hand plus it looks great
customer_reviews.author: T. Hon

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! Would recommend to anyone with mix of music matching knives
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS KNIFE HOLDER!! I'm sorry to all the people who have written bad reviews because I almost didnt buy it but we havent had any problems with the "sticks" breaking and it holds several knifes. It's a wonderful universal holder so if you're on the fence about it, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Chelci

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. I can fit some 22 knives in this ...
customer_reviews.text: It exactly as described, well made, sturdy. I can fit some 22 knives in this block. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife holder. Best thing since sliced bread. Holds knives secqurly. Easy in and out and you don't have to waste time finding a slot. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Also a great value.
customer_reviews.text: This solves a big problem in our kitchen. MUCH easier to use than a standard knife block were my knives get stuck all time going in and out. Also a great value.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Arundel

customer_reviews.title: The product was awesome, it was too small for the amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was awesome, it was too small for the amount of knives I have. I selected 1 click by instead of cart so I didn't get to measure anything to see if it was the right fit before I actually purchased it. I would recommend it for someone that does not have a huge amount of knives like i do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So convenient....
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can just put a knife in it, no matter the size, or orientation. Arrive on time, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have probably 10 knives in mine. My husband makes knives so I have a lot of nice knives. It fits under the counter easily, doesn't take up too much room, and looks cute. I will get another smaller one for steak knives only
customer_reviews.author: Darla Raglin

customer_reviews.title: Great look and functionality
customer_reviews.text: we really like the holder as it has these little rods that lets you put the knife where ever you want. the natural finish is very nice and complements our knives.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: It is now impossible to insert knives in the top section. The material seems to have broken up Used since April. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Clay

customer_reviews.title: Solid knife block
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these blocks for a while. I bought a second for my parents who were running out of room for knives. This block holds the knives well and I don't notice any dulling faster than drawer or woodblock storage would cause
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever! I have odds and ends knives that all fit perfectly in this knife block. I love the way you can just put them wherever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this case it works so well with all my knives. Very versatile and matches my kitchen very well
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing knife holder. It's so easy to use amd clean. Just do not put it in the dishwasher or it will melt a bit. Would be nice if it was able to go in a dishwasher to clean it but other than that it is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kael H

customer_reviews.title: Holds knives perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Has room for our kitchen knives and easy to fit them all in
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. And it arrived two days later
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. And it arrived two days later, the exact time I needed them for a party I was hosting. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: JohnFrancisX

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife block. While the little "sticks" inside took a little getting used to I very much like the idea of putting my knives where I want them & not being confined to traditional slots. Looks good sitting on my counter also. Comfortably holds 12 knives. More will fit but it would be crowded.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: So my kitchen knives are all shapes and sizes. I’m not one for sets. I was looking for a way to store them without having to keep them all in a drawer in their sleeves were my children can reach them. This is fantastic because you can literally stick the knives in any direction and squeeze them all together. I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: JMART216

customer_reviews.title: It was great for us as we don't have a set of ...
customer_reviews.text: It was great for us as we don't have a set of knives that go together- so for someone who has several knives that are mismatched it fits all of them really well. It's stylish on our counter top, I like the wood and weight of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The best. Works amazing. Will suggest to get for random knives laying around. Fits all sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking wood
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! I wanted a block to hold my 3pc. set of knives and a pair of scissors. It could hold a couple more! Nice looking wood. Looks great on counter.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to insert all my knives without any trouble. No danger of dulling the blades and easy to remove knives from the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Interior black fibers feel like they will give out in time. Seems really sturdy for now though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: great tool for the kitchen--price is right
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good. can't see why it won't last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: BrilliantBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it overall, but a bit hard to wash
customer_reviews.author: rnotk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. It has good weight and holds my knives perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff StrichartTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight knife holder
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because our previous knife holder was huge, this was smaller but still fits all of our knives! Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better thn the first one I had
customer_reviews.text: Better thn the first one I had. You can put smaller knives on the lower level and bigger ones up above.
customer_reviews.author: sharon fox

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Knifes
customer_reviews.text: It's a good knife holder, but the plastic straws scratched my knifes. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can various sized knives fit wherever and don't have to mess with them going in specific holes. Also both top and bottom come out and can be cleaned which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I like this knife block. The quality is good. I wanted a block that would hold my kitchen scissors with my knives. This works great. It will hold any utensil of any shape or thickness.
customer_reviews.author: amy tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I would've like, but I like that it holds all my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I would've like, but I like that it holds all my extra knives...it's well made made and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hach

customer_reviews.title: Hold knives well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Used this with my new knives that didn’t come with a storage container. They fit well and look great in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than the one I was replacing Easier to insert knives and spate place for steak knives
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the block. Doesn’t take up too much room on the counter top. It’s cool it can be put in the dishwasher. Knives slide in like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great knife storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for all the extra sharp knives we have. I love it! It accommodates all shapes and sixes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Versatility of knife size
customer_reviews.text: The knife storage block is very nice and I like how you are not limited on the size of a knife since their are no slots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my knives but a few of the black pieces have come out. Not enough to be noticeable but it was just annoying since I’ve only had it for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I like the separation of the smaller knives from the large ones. Fits perfectly on my countertop next to the stove.
customer_reviews.author: william strom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's basically what I expected. Feels cheaper than I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Yuffie

customer_reviews.title: This is a good sized knife block which allows for several knives to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized knife block which allows for several knives to easily slid into it. The t wo tiered system helps keep the knives organized.
customer_reviews.author: Building man

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product! I had a bunch of loose knives and such and this is perfect for all size knives! And at good price point
customer_reviews.author: Mainegurl

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s pretty and functional for all my knives.
customer_reviews.author: A. Street

customer_reviews.title: Bristles missing, not flexible
customer_reviews.text: The wood had a defect in it. Sections of bristles were missing in upper and lower parts. The bristles are brittle, not flexible like the Koosh bristles I thought it’d be
customer_reviews.author: Elle Emm Emm

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: Really like versatility of how many knives can be stored without harming the blades. Unique item and have purchased as gift for office staff. Wood could be finished better.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bizar

customer_reviews.title: Unreasonable Design
customer_reviews.text: After a few days use, the knifes will be very difficult to insert cause the filler inside the wood holder will be intertwined all together.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

product_meta.title: Mantello 2 Tier Universal Wood Knife Block Knife Holder Storage Organizer
product_meta.description: The Mantello 2 Tier Universal Wood Knife Block is our square shaped wood knife block. No more worrying if your knife will fit in a slot. Mix and match kitchen knife block sets store all your knives. Store steak knives, paring knives, meat thermometers, kitchen shears and more. Large tier accommodates knives with blades 8 inches long and the small tier fits knives up 5 inches long. It features a smooth light oak wood grain, easily wipes clean. **Do not overfill, Insert knives carefully to avoid bending rods.**
feature_bullets: Fits knife blades up to 8-Inches long
Flex rods won’t chip or dull your knife blades
Universal storage, allows you to insert knives anywhere
Flex rods are removable and are top-rack dishwasher safe (No heat dry)
Overall Dimensions: 9.5" H x 4.25" W x 7" D. **Knives not included**
